page.title: 12Yetholm Festival
page.content: In 1980 an annual June Festival was revived and and this now finances the running of the Playing Field and Pavilion.The build up to the Festival starts in May at the Annual Village Concert with the annoucement of the principals,the Bari Gadgi and Bari Manushi. The concert, held in the Wauchope Hall consists entirely of local talent, the Primary School, the cub pack, the 'Yetholm Sketch' and other performers. The Festival lasting five days, starts on the Wednesday with a ride out to stobs-stanes followed by a small reception at the Border Hotel. On Thursday, a Sports meeting, a Ladies Football Match and coffee in the pavilion.{Friday-}is a rounders tournament, a disco and B B Q {Saturday-}Street party, pram race, Fancy Dress, Water Games and a dance {Sunday-}Fun Run, Primary fives, quoits
